parameters.name: Visibility
parameters.description: Visibility state of this message as defined by swPropertyManagerPageMessageVisibility

parameters.name: Expanded
parameters.description: Expand, compress, or leave the state of the message as is, as defined by swPropertyManagerPageMessageExpanded

title: IPropertyManagerPage2.SetMessage3
description: Sets the message in this PropertyManager page.
signature:
System.Boolean SetMessage3( 
   System.String
Message
,
   System.Int32
Visibility
,
   System.Int32
Expanded
,
   System.String
Caption
)

parameters.name: Visibility
parameters.description: Visibility state of this message as defined by swPropertyManagerPageMessageVisibility

parameters.name: Expanded
parameters.description: Expand, compress, or leave the state of the message as is, as defined by swPropertyManagerPageMessageExpanded

returns: True if the message is set, false if not
remarks:
If Caption is empty, then the current caption is not changed.
This method should be useful when creating multi-page PropertyManager pages where you want different informational messages on each page.
